summary: CAR LOSES POWER AND STALLS AT CITY OR HIGHWAY SPEEDS (HAVE TO PULL OVER).  CAR SHUTS DOWN WHEN IDLING. FORD WAS CONTACTED BY OUR SERVICE CENTER AND WE'RE TOLD WE NEED A NEW THROTTLE BODY, BUT THEY ARE ON BACK-ORDER.  THERE ARE AT LEAST 5000 ORDERS AHEAD OF US.  SERVICE PERSON SAID HE IS NOT AWARE OF A RECALL FOR THIS PROBLEM.  CAR WAS PURCHASED NEW.  *TR
